body.raw:
# Tabs A series of layered content sections, called tab panels, that are shown one at a time. ## Installation ## Import - **TabsRoot**: All parts of the tabs are included. - **TabsList**: Contains the buttons or tabs aligned with the edge of the active content. - **TabsTab**: This button activates related content. - **TabsContent**: Includes content related to each tab. ### Another way to import ```js 'use client'; import { Tabs } from '@melio-ui/tabs'; Tab1 Tab2

TabContent1

TabContent2

 ; ``` > 'use client' must be used when rendering on the server side. ## API Reference ### TabsRoot All parts of the tabs are included. TypeAttributes.Orientation

"horizontal" | "vertical" ), description: 'Direction for the placement of the Tabs component.', }, { name: 'renderMode', required: false, type: '"selecting" | "selected" | "force"', default: '"selecting"', description: ( <> How to render tab content.

selecting: Rendering only the currently activated tab content.
selected: Rendering tab contents that have been activated.
force: Rendering all tab contents. ), }, { name: 'onValueChange', required: false, type: '(value: string) => void', description: 'The callback invoked when a tab content is activated.', }, ]} /> ### TabsList Contains the buttons or tabs aligned with the edge of the active content. ### TabsTab This button activates related content. ### TabsContent Includes content related to each tab. ## Examples ### defaultValue ```jsx Tab1 Tab2 Tab3

TabContent1

TabContent2

TabContent3

 ``` ### disabled tab ```jsx Tab1 Tab2 Tab3

TabContent1

TabContent2

TabContent3

 ``` ### Orientation ```jsx Tab1 Tab2 Tab3

TabContent1

TabContent2

TabContent3

 ```
